Method Summary
 boolean add(E obj)
          adds the given Object (which must be Comparable) to the Heap, percolating it up to its proper location

          Prints out the Heap as a tree structure, useful for debugging

          determines if the Heap has any elements
 E peekMin()
          returns the smallest Object in the Heap
 E remove()
          removes and returns the smallest Object in the Heap, and then rearranges the remaining elements to make them a valid Heap again
 java.lang.String toString()
          returns a String representation of this Heap as a list of all the node values in order
